They're perfect. The material feels perfect on my skin. It's not super soft, but not rough either. Didn't shrink in the wash. I also enjoy how loose it feels around the legs and thighs so I feel like I have a lot of room when walking. I've already ordered like 5 more. I'm 5'8 and about 160lbs and the medium size fits perfectly and I can tell if I put on even 15 more pounds it would still fit fine.

I love these pants by JMIERR. The material feels high quality and very comfortable, soft and stretchy. The elastic waist band feels good and I like that the ankles also have elastic so you can pull the legs up capri style if you want. Comfortable

I am six foot one inch tall. I wear a 40 or 42 size waist and 32 inch inseam. I bought the XXXL size. They fit absolutely perfectly! They fit exactly how I was hoping they would. Only thing is as far as I can tell there isn’t much or any “spandex” material in these, so I wouldn’t reccomend running in them, you may tear them. Four pockets - two in the front two in the rear. A lot of other “jogger” brands only have one rear pocket and I personally appreciate the fact that they give you that extra pocket. When it comes to the color, it doesn’t wash out in the washing machine nor stain any other articles of clothing. They’re very breathable; if you’re buying these to keep you warm in the fall/winter, you may want some longjohns underneath. Material quality I would rate a 70. I’m wearing these to casual events and not to work in the garage if you catch my drift. When it comes to rip resistance, honestly they’re going to tear - hence the reason I said I would wear them for “knockin’ around” or to casual events; definitely not so much a work pant. I have bought so far three different pairs each with a different color, and they all look and fit great. I recommend these for a nice casual pair of tapered style jogger pants, but wouldn’t advise running or jogging in them.

I'm 5'10, 185 lbs and I've been getting a large size in these pants. In jeans I'll normally wear about 33/34x30 size. The first pair of these I bought were black and in XL, wasn't sure how much they'd shrink. The XL fits nice if I wanted a more baggy look. I bought a 2nd pair in black and got a large. These fit nice even after a couple washes, more of the fit I was wanting. So I got a 3rd pair in the dark purple red color and a 4th pair in the soft khaki. Super comfy and they look good. I was debating on maybe trying a medium for a more fitted/skinny pant look but I don't think they'd be too comfortable for me, so I'm sticking with the large size and probably get some more colors especially when they're on sale!

The JMIERR Men's Casual Joggers are perfect for both casual wear and outdoor activities. Made from soft, durable cotton, these pants offer both comfort and durability. The adjustable drawstring provides a snug fit, while the multiple cargo pockets add practicality and style. Whether you're hiking, running errands, or just lounging, these joggers are versatile enough for any occasion. The lightweight material allows for easy movement, and the chino design gives them a polished look. Overall, these joggers are a great combination of style, comfort, and functionality. Highly recommended for anyone looking for versatile and reliable casual pants!
